Text:
Hi Vantank

We are the couple in the video that you have uploaded. It is an illegally uploaded video of me and my wife which was uploaded from our stolen laptop. We have been facing a lot of embarassment and harassment because of this.

We request you to please remove this torrent. You can contact us on akash.7111980@gmail.com We are willing to provide identification proof to authenticate our claim.

Regards

Hi Vantank

We are still waiting for your reply. it is becoming harder for us day by day. Please respond quickly. You can contact us on akash.7111980@gmail.com.

Regards

Hi,

Are you reading this Vantank? we have no other way to contact you. Please, we are still waiting for your reply.

if any admin or moderator or anyone who can help us... please contact us on our email as soon as possible.

Regards
